query: The daily-digest plugin should inject today's daily log into the session context on session:created
expected_behavior: The daily-digest plugin registers a handler for the session:created hook event
When a new session is created, the hook fires and today's daily log content is read from memory/YYYY-MM-DD.md
The daily log is prepended to the session context before the first LLM call
If today's daily log does not exist yet, the hook silently skips injection with no error
Hooks from other plugins also fire for session:created without being suppressed
